long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An Cx0 Wallet in your Browser

Cx0 Wallet is an extension for accessing CPCx0-enabled distributed applications, or "Dapps" in your browser!

The extension injects the CPCx0 Chain web3 API into every website's javascript context, so that Dapps can read from the blockchain.

Cx0 Wallet also lets the user manage their own token (via private keys, local client wallet), so when a Dapp wants to perform a transaction and write to the blockchain, the user gets a secure interface to review the transaction, before approving or rejecting it.

Because it adds functionality to the normal browser context, Cx0 Wallet requires the permission to read and write to any webpage. You can always "view the source" of Cx0 Wallet the way you do any Chrome extension

Enables access to CPCx0 Chain Ecosystem and:
Web 3.0
Dapps
NFTs
erc20
tokens
ICOs
erc271
...and more!
